input_text: A user can't reset password because of an error
output_text: Please make sure that the user set their password.

input_text: User cannot reset the Admin Portal (manager role) password
output_text: Please make sure that the user set their password.

input_text: A user cannot receive a reset password email

input_text: A customer cannot link their account
